QuestData.Title: He Needs Ale!
QuestData.Description: <Marley grasps the side of your head with a shaking, bloody hand.>$B$BAle... Must... have ale...$B$BOl' Barkerstout from inside. <He coughs.> That should ... do the trick.
QuestData.LogDescription: Search Bael'dun Keep for a Mug of Ol' Barkerstout and bring it to Marley Twinbraid at the entrance.
QuestData.CompletionText: <Marley's breathing is ragged, coming and going in shuddering gasps.>$B$B<His eyes look at you imploringly.>
QuestData.RewardText: <Marley's eyes sparkle as you rush toward him with the ale. He grasps the mug in both of his shaking hands and upends it, white foam spilling out over his blood-caked beard.>$B$BAh... that's the stuff. Ol' Barkerstout... Thank you, friend.$B$BThat'll make this... a little easier.$B$B<Coughing one final time, he slumps over the shattered control console, the half-empty mug crashing to the ground and spilling its contents into the sand. His eyes glaze over.>$B$B<Marley Twinbraid is dead.>
